name: Moby (GB Jam Version)
description:
Made by Jon Coughlin and Travis Hawks for the 2016 GBJAM.

Guide Moby as he explores nature and tries to find as many bugs as he can.

The controls are listed from the start menu, but Z is the "B" button and X is the "A" button. Tab will open the in-game menu ("SELECT") and spacebar acts as "START".

We had lots of ideas for this project that we didn't have time to implement. Watch for an updated version soon with a few more features and overall improvements! Coming in Q4 2017!
